column8: Good to see MCA minister making the headlines
Nothing says more about the MCA than a thick skin, a messy interior and a long, lingering smell.
Those aren't in power, like opposition themselves can continue to envy the status MCA has in our government. On a side note, how to be in power if their pakatan can't last for a term. Hahaha...

Don't delude yourself, MCA has no real powers except for writing surat sokongan. Their ministers are hamstrung by the fact the most important parts of their portfolios are under the jurisdiction of others. For example, Liow's Ministry of Transport has little influence over SPAD, the influential (and lucrative) board for public transportation which is actually in the Jabatan Perdana Menteri.MCA is noted for their public service like 1MCA Medical Foundation but as a political entity they are little more than figureheads.
did he wear his shock collar?

Which is actually true. Never mind being called a running dog or just a punching bag to make UMNO look strong.In the end MCA members and their families still ending up with contracts and all. So yeah...they have the power to they don't mind being called anything.Janji kaya.
Musang King for China, D101 for Malaysia. Durian diplomacy.
Fuck it la. Coz of prc now all sellers whine low yield and double up musang king price.
Haha itulah namanya DURIAN DIPLOMACY! hahaha. Orang Malaysia makan durian 101 jer la.
